duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and create floor plans using computer-aided drafting software, maintaining PCMA and CAD Department design and drawing standards.
Utilize computer skills and knowledge of current release of AutoCAD to complete detailed room layouts.
Provide outstanding customer service by establishing excellent working relationships with clients, company employees, and all related project staff.
Manage multiple projects to completion and work at a high level of efficiency under extreme deadlines.
Frequently contact facilities to speak with Event Coordinator or another representative regarding room layouts.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS or Associates Degree in Architectural Design or related industry preferred
